channel.title: Client background picture?
channel.description: i cant change it, there isnt a picture in the files? help!

item.title: Client background picture?
item.dc:creator: @Fluoxetine Fluoxetine
item.description:
@Fluoxetine wrote:

OR, if you are using Galkon’s client (Exion or Project insanity one) then go to Sprites.java and search for Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage and it will be there, or it may say //Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().createImage

If this is correct, delete the 2 “//” from the first line and put them on the second, as follows:

Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage(location of your desired background image here, MAKE SURE IT STAYS IN BRACKETS!); //Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().createImage(abyte0);

Read full topic
